response.overview: News about death of Shivaji Maharaj reaches Moghal kingdom to Aurangzeb who announces celebration as he feels its downfall of Maratha empire.The Mogul's are in relax mode living with peace as there is no war but aren't aware that it's a peace before the storm.The Maratha empire attacks Burhanpur key administrative of Moghul's led my Sambahji Maharaj (Chhaava) son of Shivaji Maharaj.The city is reduced to ashes and Aurangzeb realizes that Shivaji has left his legacy behind in his son.Sambhaji is welcomed home by his wife Yesubai on the other hand Sambahji's step mother Soyrabai along with her brothers is conspiring against him so that her son Rajaram can attain the throne.Aurangzed reaches Burhanpur and swears to remain uncrowned until he defeats Sambhaji and creates havoc in Maharashtra
response.title: Chavva
